armor.name: Johnny's Jacket
armor.description: This bomber jacket is made of tanned leather harvested from Stench Kows on the Lower Planes. It acts as studded leather +1 (AC 13 + Dex) and provides resistance to fire damage

weapons.name: Deadeye Arcus
weapons.description: This longbow (1d8 piercing damage, range 150'/600') gains an additional +1 to hit and damage rolls. Once per day, as a bonus action, the user can choose to add 1d10 to their next attack or damage roll.
traits: Once per day, add 1d10 to next attack or damage roll
